messages.title: MARK PRISK: A RECORD OF ACTION.
messages.content: As your local MP, Mark has worked hard to help people in need and to fight for our community. He actively supports voluntary groups and charities, as well as helping local businesses. To continue that work he needs your vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes 'regional housing targets' including erecting 3,000 acres of green fields north of Harlow. He has helped to ensure that future residential development meets local needs.
Scrapped plans for a new hospital at Hatfield. He has campaigned for better local facilities, backed GP surgeries to create local surgeries and successfully lobbied for a new health centre.
Fought to save local Post Offices from closure.

mentions.candidate: Mark has worked hard to help people

issues.environment: NO SECOND RUNWAY; Opposes expansion at Stansted Airport.
issues.health: IMPROVING HEALTH CARE; Successfully lobbied for a new health centre.

housing.content: LOCAL HOUSING FOR LOCAL NEEDS; Mark leads group against 3000 acres of green fields north of Harlow. He has helped to ensure that future residential developments meet local needs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked to help people in need, support voluntary groups and charities, and help local businesses.

contactInformation.address: St Ives Mill, Crane Mead, Ware, Hertfordshire, SG12 9PY

images.caption: MARK PRISK: A RECORD OF ACTION.
